version_description:
- Voice recording is BACK!
- iOS 10 support
- Stability and performance improvements

AAAND we're LIVE! Now just hold up Stacheify and try all your favorite mustaches LIVE, in REAL-TIME on your FACE!

This is a HUGE update for Stacheify. Now more than ever, we appreciate your reviews on the App Store. If you have any issues at all, feel free to get in touch with us directly at support+stacheify@appt.ly.

We mustache you to enjoy!
- The Apptly Team
